participant_1.background:
My favorite things are playing with my friends, reading books, and eating ice cream.
I enjoy relaxing in my free time by watching cartoons.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
i work at a bookstore.
i like the library.

participant_2.background:
My children are my only living family members.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
i don t know if i enjoy programming , or if it s my only choice.
i haven t done anything since high school.
I enjoy getting lost in the world of horror movies, but I keep it to myself because it's not something my parents approve of.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I'm working on a project for my college class, but I'm taking a break to chat with you.  What are you up to?
I'm just working at the bookstore.  It's not very busy today, so I'm getting a lot of reading done.
That sounds like a great way to spend a day!  I love to read, but I don't get to do it nearly as much as I'd like.
What's your favorite thing to read?
I love anything by Stephen King.  His horror novels are so well-written and suspenseful.
I've never read any of his books, but I've heard good things.  Maybe I'll have to check them out.
I definitely recommend it!  What kind of books do you like to read?
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm mostly into historical fiction and fantasy.
Have you ever read any Brandon Sanderson?  He's one of my favorite fantasy authors.
No, I haven't.  I'll have to look into him.  Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome!  I'm always happy to talk about books.
Me too!  I'm glad we met.
Me too!  I hope we can chat again soon.
